Package com.example.calculator.service

Class CalculatorService

java.lang.Object
com.example.calculator.service.CalculatorService
@Service public class CalculatorService extends Object
Service class for handling calculator operations. Provides methods for single calculations and chained operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CalculatorService(List<MathOperation> operationList)
    Creates a new calculator service with injected operations.

    Performs a chain of calculations.

  • Constructor Details

    • CalculatorService

      public CalculatorService(List<MathOperation> operationList)
      Creates a new calculator service with injected operations.
      Parameters:
      operationList - list of available mathematical operations

  • Method Details

    • calculate

      public Number calculate(Operation op, Number num1, Number num2)
      Performs a single calculation.
      Parameters:
      op - the operation to perform
      num1 - first operand
      num2 - second operand
      Returns:
      result of the calculation
      Throws:
      CalculatorException - if operation is not supported

    • chainCalculate

      public Number chainCalculate(Number initial, List<ChainOperation> chainOperations)
      Performs a chain of calculations.
      Parameters:
      initial - starting value
      chainOperations - list of operations to perform in sequence
      Returns:
      final result after all operations
      Throws:
      CalculatorException - if chain is empty or contains invalid operations
